messages.Settings.dev.lecloutpanda.optizoom.keyBi: The key used to activate zoom.
messages.Settings.dev.lecloutpanda.optizoom.zoomF: The field of view while zoomed in.
messages.Settings.dev.lecloutpanda.optizoom.toggl: Toggle zoom on key press instead of holding.
messages.Settings.dev.lecloutpanda.optizoom.zoomS: The speed at which zooming transitions occur.
messages.Settings.dev.lecloutpanda.optizoom.scrol: Enable zooming with the scroll wheel.
The speed of zooming when using the scroll wheel.
messages.Settings.dev.lecloutpanda.optizoom.overl: The size of the zoom overlay.
The image URI used for the zoom overlay.
Enable background rendering for the overlay.
The background color of the overlay.
messages.Settings.dev.lecloutpanda.optizoom.zoomI: The sound played when zooming in (URI). Null disables it.
messages.Settings.dev.lecloutpanda.optizoom.zoomO: The sound played when zooming out (URI). Null disables it.
messages.Settings.dev.lecloutpanda.optizoom.zoomV: The volume of zoom sounds. Range: 0â€“1.
messages.Settings.dev.lecloutpanda.optizoom.expos: Expose a zoomed-in variable on the user (User/optizoom.zoomed_in).
